text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/language/locations/caption":{"text":"locations","title":"$:/language/locations/caption"},"$:/language/locations/hint":{"text":"Navigate to locations","title":"$:/language/locations/hint"},"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/icon"},"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/image":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/image","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/license":{"text":"Locations Button Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/readme":{"text":"This plugin adds the ''locations'' button to the Page Toolbar. The button will navigate to the Locations tiddler. This plugin comprises: * Image * Template * Caption and hint","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/readme","tags":""},"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/stylesheet":{"text":".tc-badge-locations {fill:#090;}.tc-icon-locations {fill:#fff;stroke:#000;stroke-width:2;height:24pt;width:24pt;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","caption":"Copy Button","button-size":"1.4em","button-hover-color":"#000","button-color":"#888"},"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/template":{"text":"<$button tooltip={{$:/language/locations/hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/locations/caption}} class=<>><$action-navigate $to='Locations'/><$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/locations/image}}<$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$text text={{$:/language/locations/caption}}/>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/locations/template","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","description":"{{$:/language/locations/hint}}","caption":"{{$:/plugins/ajh/locations/image}} {{$:/language/locations/caption}}"}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/locations
